title: Hour 1 - Juan Soto Declines Offer, Cameron Smith Wins The Open
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Juan Soto Declines Offer, Cameron Smith Wins The Open
description:
Dan talks about Juan Soto declining a huge deal from the Nationals and other huge contracts that have been offered to major-leaguers throughout history. And he thinks the LIV Tour is already pursuing newly crowned Open Champion, Cameron Smith.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
